name: Tropius

passive.name: Harvest
passive.effect: When this Pokemon uses a Berry, flip a coin: If it has a Fire Energy attached, flip 2 coins instead. If any coins flipped are heads, don't discard the Berry, but the effect still activates.

attacks.name: Sunbathe
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, generate a Fire Energy and attach it to this Pokemon.

attacks.name: Solar Beam
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon to use this attack.

flavor: These Pokemon grow long necks to soak in solar rays. Their unique skeletal structure lets them sleep with their heads high in the sky.
